info.title: Streaming App API
info.description: API documentation for the streaming application including user authentication, subscriptions, chat, and payment features

get.description: Get paginated list of all active superstar stories with superstar info
Get paginated list of all superstar posts with superstar info
Get all conversations for the authenticated superstar with pagination
Get all messages in a specific conversation for the authenticated superstar

post.description: Send a text message or file to a conversation

message_type: The message type field is required.

post.description: Mark all user messages in a conversation as read

get.description: Get total count of unread messages from all conversations

put.description: Update the status of a conversation (active, ended, blocked)

delete.description: Delete a message sent by the superstar

get.description: Fetch superstar's own payment history with pagination
Show system revenue (20% of all payments) with breakdown
View payment history for specific user with pagination

post.description: Login endpoint for superstars using email or username

message.example: Please use admin app for admin access

post.description: Logout of authenticated superstar and revoke token

get.description: Get authenticated superstar's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated superstar's profile information

profile_image.description: Profile image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, max 2MB)

current_password: The current password field is required.

get.description: Get authenticated superstar's posts with pagination and filtering options

post.description: Create a new post for the authenticated superstar

media_type: The media type field is required.

get.description: Get a specific post by ID for the authenticated superstar

put.description: Update an existing post for the authenticated superstar

media_type: The media type must be image or video.

delete.description: Delete a specific post for the authenticated superstar

get.description: Get all active stories for authenticated superstar

post.description: Upload a new story (image or video)

file_type: The file type field is required.

get.description: Get a specific story by ID
Serve story file from storage (public access)

post.description: Find or create conversation with a superstar

parameters.name: superstarId
parameters.description: Superstar ID to start chat with

get.description: Get all conversations for the authenticated user
Get count of unread messages for the authenticated user

post.description: Mark all messages in conversation as read for the authenticated user

put.description: Update the status of a conversation (active, ended, blocked)

post.description: Process payment for chat session and create payment records

get.description: Get user's payment history with pagination
Fetch all user payments with pagination
Fetch payments filtered by specific superstar with pagination
View complete transaction details by reference
Get authenticated user's subscriptions with pagination. Returns superstars with their details

post.description: Subscribe to a superstar and increases total_followers count

superstar_id: The superstar id field is required.

post.description: Subscribe to a superstar using ID in URL and increases total_followers count

message.example: You are already subscribed to this superstar

delete.description: Unsubscribe from a superstar and decreases total_followers count

post.description: This endpoint handles Google OAuth login by checking if the email exists, updating or creating user data, and returning user data with Sanctum token

get.description: Get current authenticated user details including total number of subscriptions

post.description: Logout user and revoke all Sanctum tokens

get.description: Get all conversations for the authenticated user with pagination
Get all messages in a specific conversation for the authenticated user

post.description: Send a text message or file to a conversation
Mark all superstar messages in a conversation as read

get.description: Get total count of unread messages from all conversations

put.description: Update the status of a conversation (active, ended, blocked)

delete.description: Delete a message sent by the authenticated user

get.summary: Get all superstars with detailed information
get.description: Fetch all superstars with username, DP image, total posts, followers count, subscription status, and cost

get.summary: Get feed of posts from subscribed superstars
get.description: Get paginated posts from all superstars that the authenticated user is subscribed to, ordered by most recent posts first
Get comprehensive information about a superstar including bio, stats, and paginated posts. Only accessible if user follows the superstar.

message.example: You must subscribe to this superstar to view their content
